name: Blood Curse (Xabi Goenaga, Narvalian, Marron121, Anabel)
name_original: Blood Curse (Xabi Goenaga, Narvalian, Marron121, Anabel)
description:
Bloodcurse is a puzzle videogame, where Sam travels to the depths of a Mayan temple with the hopes of lifting a curse which makes them inmortal.

Each room has a puzzle to be completed, but you have to be quick; a monster is hiding in the depths of the temple, and they don't like people coming in their territory...

CONTROLS

-W,A,S,D: Movement of the character

-Shift: Run

-E: Interact with objects

-Z,X: Change selected power

-Space: Use selected power.

MADE BY:

-Anabel Jesús Lorenzo (Artist)

-Iván Ramos Benito (Artist)

-Aaron Miranda Gómez (Level/Narrative Designer)

-Xabier Goenaga Urkiola (Programmer & Sound Designer)
